A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A shell shock in the star wars canon and from the previous episode 7 installment. It's like the writer of this film hates JJ Abrams\, or is so self absorbed to care what anyone else thinks. Character development is too fast\, and lacks depth and emotional connection. Is this amateur hour at Disney? Special Effects are great! Music is fantastic! Carrie Fisher and Mark Hamill are always brilliant in Star Wars.
